summary: Dixon patrols the US/Mexican border. He's recognized from years ago in an LA gang. The gang needs his help smuggling drugs across the border and holds his wife and daughter hostage.
cast: Cuba Gooding Jr.|Omari Hardwick|Evan Ross|Dean Norris|Malieek Straughter|AMG|Sharon Leal|Omar Paz Trujillo|Chris Browning|William Sterchi|Francisco A. Fernandez|Jimmie Romero|Bryan Lane|Dan Burkarth|Josh Coffman|Genia Michaela|Luce Rains|Angelique Midthunder|Giselle Bonilla|Jesus Jr.|Art Bonilla|Dave Colon|Daniel J Gonzales|Fredrick Lopez|Brian Reece|Z. Ray Wakeman
title: Frontera límite
